article_title: Restaurants offer healthier choices as nutrition label deadline nears
article_text: November 3, 2015, 8:14 AM |Just over a year from now, the Affordable Care Act will force big restaurant chains to include nutrition labeling on their menus. New research finds rules already in place may not mean we eat fewer calories, but they could lead restaurants to add healthier offerings for customers. Dr. Tara Narula joins “CBS This Morning” to discuss the findings.
